page.title: 05Clifford Farm and Bridge -1-
page.content: A locally well known beauty spot,the farm has been made into a caravan site which is open from mid March to mid November. Two families of two sisters with their husbands and four children have been operating the caravan site since November 1984 having moved to the property from Manchester and Preston. They enjoyed their first winter there and found a strong contrast in their life style after having been owners of a large public house. The children especially like to travel to school some three miles daily to Moretonhampstead by school bus or the family Land Rover when there is snow and the bus is unable to negotiate the steep and narrow lanes.
